Question: What operations does this tool perform? — xcms enables graphical inspection of spectral data, quantitative analysis without internal standards, quality assessment, alignment of retention times across samples, automated feature extraction, visualization of chromatographic traces, and removal of unwanted signals in mass spectrometry datasets.

Question: What can your tool do with mass spectrometry data? — xcms provides capabilities for displaying mass spectra graphically, performing label-free intensity-based quantitation, validating data quality, synchronizing retention time differences between runs, identifying peaks automatically, rendering extracted ion chromatograms, and eliminating background noise.
